OOC:  Okay, going to get back to posting here.  Lets see how things

ut.

Megatron X:

After much study and paitent waiting, three aircraft; two=
 about the 
size of an average maximal and the third signifigantly smaller-=
 
infiltrated the city from three different directions.  The largest 
rumbl=
ed down a thouroghfair, almost a block in shape.  At it's bow 
was a large =
barreled fusion cannon wile the top portion contained two 
secondary cannon=
s on either side of a twin missile pod.  The second 
aircraft; noticably fa=
ster, was set apart by its air foils and two 
precision beam rifles.  The l=
ast, was tiny by comparison, flying high 
over the building until it dove d=
own to join the other two.

Once the three craft converged, they combinded =
into an even larger 
ship, the small flyer compacting and fitting inside th=
e faster flyer, 
which connected to the bow section of the larger gunship. =
 The ship 
hovered over an intersection for several minutes as a crowd gath=
er 
around it.  And then it suddenly fell.

But before it crashed to the ro=
adway, it transformed.  The cannons 
fell away and reconfigured as the body=
 reformed.  The large engines 
formed strong legs.  The wings and forward f=
uselage formed the upper 
body and arms, with the wings forming two broad s=
hields at the 
shoulders.  The fusion cannon attached to the bottom of the =
right 
forearm, while the twin barreled rifle found home in the left hand. =
 
With missiles to protect his back, Megatron X Stood before the crowd 
and=
 sneered.  

"People of the world, Megatron has returned!"
